member.name: T:R2API.CharacterBodyAPI
member.summary: API for adding various stuff to Character Body such as: Modded Body Flags

member.name: M:R2API.CharacterBodyAPI.ReserveBodyFlag
member.summary: Reserve ModdedBodyFlag to use it with , and

member.name: P:R2API.CharacterBodyAPI.Loaded
member.summary: Return true if the submodule is loaded.

member.name: P:R2API.CharacterBodyAPI.ModdedBodyFlagCount
member.summary: Reserved ModdedBodyFlagCount count

member.name: M:R2API.CharacterBodyAPI.AddModdedBodyFlag(RoR2.CharacterBody,R2API.CharacterBodyAPI.ModdedBodyFlag)
member.summary: Adding ModdedBodyFlag to CharacterBody. You can add more than one body flag to one CharacterBody

member.name: M:R2API.CharacterBodyAPI.RemoveModdedBodyFlag(RoR2.CharacterBody,R2API.CharacterBodyAPI.ModdedBodyFlag)
member.summary: Removing ModdedBodyFlag from CharacterBody instance.

member.name: M:R2API.CharacterBodyAPI.HasAnyModdedBodyFlag(RoR2.CharacterBody)
member.summary: Checks if CharacterBody instance has any ModdedBodyFlag assigned. One CharacterBody can have more than one body flag.

member.name: M:R2API.CharacterBodyAPI.HasModdedBodyFlag(RoR2.CharacterBody,R2API.CharacterBodyAPI.ModdedBodyFlag)
member.summary: Checks if CharacterBody instance has ModdedBodyFlag assigned. One CharacterBody can have more than one body flag.

member.name: F:R2API.CharacterBodyAPI.PluginVersion
member.summary: Version of the plugin, should be matching with the thunderstore package.

member.name: T:R2API.HealthBarAPI
member.summary: API for modifying the HealthBar

member.name: M:R2API.HealthBarAPI.RegisterBarOverlay(R2API.HealthBarAPI.BarOverlayInfo)
member.summary: Registers a new HealthBar overlay. Must be called before RoR2Application.onLoad finishes.
member.returns: The BarOverlayIndex that corresponds to your overlay, or BarOverlayIndex.None if called too late. Use this if you need to assign the bar to a specific body.

member.name: M:R2API.HealthBarAPI.AddOverlayToBody(RoR2.CharacterBody,R2API.HealthBarAPI.BarOverlayIndex)
member.summary: Marks a HealthBar overlay as applying to a specific body.

member.name: M:R2API.HealthBarAPI.RemoveOverlayFromBody(RoR2.CharacterBody,R2API.HealthBarAPI.BarOverlayIndex)
member.summary: Unmarks a HealthBar overlay as applying to a specific body.

member.name: T:R2API.HealthBarAPI.BarOverlayInfo
member.summary: Defines on a modded HealthBar overlay.

member.name: F:R2API.HealthBarAPI.BarOverlayInfo.BarInfo
member.summary: A template BarInfo that will be applied to the HealthBar if assigned.

member.name: F:R2API.HealthBarAPI.BarOverlayInfo.BodySpecific
member.summary: Causes your bar to only be handled on bodies it is assigned to, via AddOverlayToCharacterBody.

member.name: F:R2API.HealthBarAPI.BarOverlayInfo.ModifyBarInfo
member.summary: A delegate which will run when HealthBar overlays are updated. Use this to set things like whether your bar is enabled or its size.

member.name: F:R2API.HealthBarAPI.BarOverlayInfo.ModifyHealthValues
member.summary: A delegate that which will run when HealthBar display values are being calculated. Use this to modify the numerical health values before they render on the HUD.

member.name: T:R2API.HealthBarAPI.BarOverlayInfo.ModifyBarInfoCallback
member.summary: A delegate that can be run when HealthBar overlays are updated. Use this to set things like whether your bar is enabled or its size.
member.param: The HealthBar the overlay is being handled on.
A reference to the BarInfo that is being used to define your overlay.

member.name: T:R2API.HealthBarAPI.BarOverlayInfo.ModifyHealthValuesCallback
member.summary: A delegate that can be run when HealthBar display values are being calculated. Use this to modify the numerical health values before they render on the HUD.
member.param: The HealthBar the display values are being modified on.
A reference to the current health value that will be displayed on the healthbar. Modify this in-place.
A reference to the current health value that will be displayed on the healthbar. Modify this in-place.

member.name: F:R2API.HealthBarAPI.BarOverlayInfo.OverlayIndex
member.summary: The identifier for this overlay type.

member.name: T:R2API.HealthBarAPI.BarOverlayIndex
member.summary: An identifier for a modded HealthBar overlay.

member.name: T:R2API.AutoVersionGen.AutoVersionAttribute
member.summary: Add a PluginVersion field to the attribut-ed class filled from the thunderstore.toml versionNumber field
